metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1516 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s X.25 set ofstandardized network protocols functionality in the way a user terminatestheir session using a simulated Ethernet card and continued usage of thisconnection. This flaw allows a local user to crash the system.
